item.title: Building Generative AI Applications With GitHub Models and .NET Aspire
item.description: Discover how to integrate AI into your .NET applications in under an hour using GitHub Models and .NET Aspire 9.4. I'll walk you through building a simple AI-powered blog analyzer that automatically categorizes your content. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/building-generative-ai-applications-with-github-models-and-dotnet-aspire
